column4: I have a Windows partition on the same hard drive as my Ubuntu partition. I want to back the Windows partition (but only the 130 GB in use) to an external drive. I need to do this from Ubuntu.
So you want to back up some files, yeah?
I want to back up only the files that are in use, yes. I don't want to write 500 GB to the external, as it's only 250 GB in size.
